'''''Come on out, Mystery Ore! Grant my wish!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to gather all seven [[Mysterious Ore]] as part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]]: [[Arkhium Forge]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to a quote from the series ''{{w|Dragon Ball}}'', "Come forth, dragon! And grant my wish!"
